parameters.name: UseKfactor
parameters.description: K-Factor ratio or -1 if not used

parameters.name: UseBendAllowance
parameters.description: Bend allowance value or -1 if not used

parameters.name: UseAutoRelief
parameters.description: True if auto-relief cuts are to be added, false if not

parameters.name: OffsetRatio
parameters.description: Distance relief cut extends beyond bend (see Remarks )

parameters.name: DoFlatten
parameters.description: True to create these three features: Sheet-Metal, Flatten-Bends, and Process-Bends, false to create only the Sheet-Metal feature

title: IPartDoc.InsertBends2
description: Creates bends in a thin-feature part.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertBends2( 
   System.Double
Radius
,
   System.String
UseBendTable
,
   System.Double
UseKfactor
,
   System.Double
UseBendAllowance
,
   System.Boolean
UseAutoRelief
,
   System.Double
OffsetRatio
,
   System.Boolean
DoFlatten
)

parameters.name: UseKfactor
parameters.description: K-Factor ratio or -1 if not used

parameters.name: UseBendAllowance
parameters.description: Bend allowance value or -1 if not used

parameters.name: UseAutoRelief
parameters.description: True if auto-relief cuts are to be added, false if not

parameters.name: OffsetRatio
parameters.description: Distance relief cut extends beyond bend (see Remarks )

parameters.name: DoFlatten
parameters.description: True to create these three features: Sheet-Metal, Flatten-Bends, and Process-Bends, false to create only the Sheet-Metal feature

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
The offsetRatio argument is from 0.05 to 2.0.  Any other value fails to create the
bend features.
When True is passed to doFlatten, all three Sheet-Metal features are created.
For more information on these arguments, see SOLIDWORKS Help.
